posts.post_title: For Sale C46 Imperial Tobacco Card
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Patrick McMenemy
I have decided to sell my one type card for the C46 Imperial Tobacco set: Bradley Kocher (Toronto).

Real nice front...minor touches to the corners and back has some toning.

Price: $55.00 shipped insured

See attached scans. I can send larger scans if needed.

[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1199839783.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1199839840.JPG[/IMG] 

Thanks,

Patrick M.

Is this card still for sale?? Please let me know
